mapper.insert: insert into member (uno,userid,memberno,username, password, email,phone, gender, regdate, updatedate,mileage,coupon, companynumber) values ((uno_seq.nextval),#{userid},#{memberno},#{username},#{password},#{email},#{phone},#{gender},sysdate,sysdate,0,null,#{companynumber})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where userid = #{userid}
select count(*) from company where companynumber = #{companynumber}
select mem.userid, password, username, memberno, regdate, updatedate, auth from member mem LEFT OUTER JOIN auth auth on mem.userid = auth.userid where mem.userid = #{userid}
select userid from member where email=#{email}
select email from member where userid =#{userid}
mapper.update: update member set password = #{password} where userid = #{userid}
